name: API FOR CAR TRAWLER
author: Rahul Thakur

sections.description:
A booking engine in the form of a widget that makes it possible for your visitors to rent a car at over 30,000 locations worldwide. The car rental database is provided by CarTrawler and is updated
on a regular basis.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload api-for-car-trawler to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [api-for-cartrawler-form redirect='false' ] in your page
sections.faq:
Can my customer really book a car anywhere in the world with this booking engine?

Absolutely, give it a try yourself!

Are my visitors personal and payment details secure?

Absolutely. Although 100% security can never be guaranteed, every search query loads a secure page that displays a list of rental cars. The page and the security is provided by CarTrawler.
